meta.description: This week on the New World Next Week: the media consolidation continues with new merger talks; Palestinians unite against Israel as the apartheid issue goes mainstream; and OSHA says employers will be responsible for the adverse effects of mandated injections.

title: Media Mergers, Palestine Strike, Vaccine Liability - New World Next Week - The Corbett Report
cleaned_text:
This week on the New World Next Week: the media consolidation continues with new merger talks; Palestinians unite against Israel as the apartheid issue goes mainstream; and OSHA says employers will be responsible for the adverse effects of mandated injections.

CLICK HERE for show notes and mp3 audio
